name: reframe.js
description: Reframe.js: responsive iframes for embedded content

scripts.build:release: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.chore:delete-changelog-branch: if git show-ref --quiet refs/heads/chore-changelog; then git branch -D chore-changelog; fi
scripts.chore:setup-next-work: git checkout master && pnpm run chore:delete-changelog-branch
scripts.chore:pr: git add . && git commit -m '[chore] updates changelog' --no-verify && git push origin chore-changelog -f
scripts.chore: pnpm run chore:delete-changelog-branch && pnpm run chore:branch && pnpm run chore:changelog && pnpm run chore:pr && pnpm run chore:setup-next-work
scripts.postpublish: git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin --tags && pnpm run chore
scripts.prepush: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.test:es-check: es-check es5 dist/noframe.js dist/reframe.js dist/noframe.min.js dist/reframe.min.js dist/jquery.noframe.js dist/jquery.reframe.js dist/jquery.reframe.min.js dist/jquery.noframe.min.js
scripts.test: pnpm run test:phantom && pnpm run test:es-check

author: Jeff Wainwright <yowainwright@gmail.com> (http://jeffry.in)
